core:description.text: Technical hiking trousers in slate gray, cut from lightweight ripstop nylon that dries in minutes after a river crossing. The fabric has that slight sheen of synthetic performance gear, with articulated knees for scrambling and gusseted cuffs that zip tight against boots or roll up for wading.
